data_table.description: EDIC. Psychological observations of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: Deidentified DCCT clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: FA1
variable.description: 1. Health status: generally how would you rate/health

variable.name: FA2
variable.description: 2. Health status: rate health now compared/one year ago
variable.value: Much better than one year ago
Somewhat better now than one year ago
Somewhat worse now than one year ago
Much worse now than one year ago

variable.name: FA3
variable.description: 3. Health status: health limited by-vigorous activities

variable.name: FA4
variable.description: 4. Health status: health limited by-moderate activities

variable.name: FA5
variable.description: 5. Health status: health limited by-lift/carry groceries

variable.name: FA6
variable.description: 6. Health status: health limited by-climb several stairs

variable.name: FA7
variable.description: 7. Health status: health limited by-climbing one flight

variable.name: FA8
variable.description: 8. Health status: health limited by-bending, kneeling, etc.

variable.name: FA9
variable.description: 9. Health status: health limited by-walk more than a mile

variable.name: FA10
variable.description: 10. Health status: health limited walking several blocks

variable.name: FA11
variable.description: 11. Health status: health limited by-walking one block

variable.name: FA12
variable.description: 12. Health status: health limited bathing/dress yourself

variable.name: FA13
variable.description: 13. Health status: due to physical health-cut down on work

variable.name: FA14
variable.description: 14. Health status: due to physical health-accomplished less

variable.name: FA15
variable.description: 15. Health status: due to physical health-limited kind of work

variable.name: FA16
variable.description: 16. Health status: due to physical health-difficulty perform.

variable.name: FA17
variable.description: 17. Health status: due to emotional problem-cut down on work

variable.name: FA18
variable.description: 18. Health status: due to emotional problem-accomplish less

variable.name: FA19
variable.description: 19. Health status: due to emotional problem-didn't work carefully

variable.name: FA20
variable.description: 20. Health status: has physical health problem affect social activities

variable.name: FA21
variable.description: 21. Health status: how much bodily pain in past 4 weeks

variable.name: FA22
variable.description: 22. Health status: does pain interfere in your normal work

variable.name: FA23
variable.description: 23. Health status: past month-did you feel full of pep
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA24
variable.description: 24. Health status: past month-been a nervous person
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA25
variable.description: 25. Health status: past month-felt down in the dumps
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA26
variable.description: 26. Health status: past month-felt calm and peaceful
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA27
variable.description: 27. Health status: past month-have a lot of energy
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA28
variable.description: 28. Health status: past month-felt downhearted and blue
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA29
variable.description: 29. Health status: past month-do you feel worn out
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA30
variable.description: 30. Health status: past month-been a happy person
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA31
variable.description: 31. Health status: past month-feel tired
variable.value: A good bit of the time

variable.name: FA32
variable.description: 32. Health status: has physical health interfered/social activities

variable.name: FA33
variable.description: 33. Health status: I get sick easier than other people

variable.name: FA34
variable.description: 34. Health status: I am as healthy as anybody I know

variable.name: FA35
variable.description: 35. Health status: I expect my health to get worse

variable.name: FA36
variable.description: 36. Health status: my health is excellent

variable.name: FA37
variable.description: 37. Health status: two weeks you felt sad/blue/depressed

variable.name: FA38
variable.description: 38. Health status: two years you felt depressed/sad most days

variable.name: FA39
variable.description: 39. Health status: have you felt depressed/sad/past/year

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Deidentified patient ID
